title: All to most in game settings reset
body: Joined a game today after not playing for a few days and most to all of my in game settings have reset or changed.

replies.body: There was an issue overnight that resulted in settings not syncing with the server, and resulting in them resetting for some players.  Everything is okay now, but some players will need to rebind and re-configure their options.  Not the most graceful return, but everything should be smooth sailing from here!

Can you please advise how are you going to reimburse players who last their games because of this issue? I played the ranked game today and pretty much fed the enemy team as support, as I'm a left-handed mouse user and my mouse buttons got reversed!

Very frustrating as there's plenty of threads about this in the forum and no official reply on what will be done with these players who encountered this issue...

>" Joined a game today after not playing for a few days and most to all of my in game settings have reset or changed."

Same here. I've noticed my settings changed dramatically too. Not only that, but I had high signs of 2000+ pings. I may be the only one who's experiencing this though.
Happened to me just now. I played a game earlier and everything was fine. Logged off and back on 3-4 hours later, and lost my settings in ranked.

Same here, it as quite odd since I was like why is my ward not going off? Cause I have my trinket set to 7 because having 1-6 for items before the trinket came into being made more sense than slapping that puppy between all my numbers.
